shadows.description: No shadow - DEFAULT for buttons, inputs, cards. Most UI elements in Root have no shadow.

shadows.description: Subtle shadow - rarely used, prefer none for most elements

shadows.description: Medium shadow - rarely used in Root patterns

shadows.name: lg
